channel.title: Hextion client; Hextion Server
channel.description:
You may call me crazy, or you might not believe me, but here's the opportunity to test my abilities on my new client project I am holding. My new project consist of a client and server, both of which are blank and use good Java conventions unlike some clients I can mention.
[b]Features[/b]
[i]Models[/i] I have added the models without hard coding them, this is my own custom client that is packaged, so far the client is as basic as it gets, there is a little Jframe menu that I have added and a world selection menu. The models are loaded from a child cache that consists all the sprites, interfaces and models I add into there, it is then loaded within a millisecond on start up and does not take a long time to load the cache fully. The main cache I am using is moparscapes client cache, as it is the only client without no bugs/glitches.
[i]Interfaces[/i] I have added custom interfaces into the cache, some are supplied by moparscape and some are supplied by other forums, the interfaces also get loaded from the sub-cache but do not work 100% yet, they do not override the current interfaces on the main cache and therefore do not cause any glitches. The "Sprites" also get loaded from the sub cache, (Easy modification)Some modification needs to be done, the game frame that is added doesn't work properly yet, the mapback is out of place. I have not tested the models yet, I am still trying to find a 508 + model file, if someone could provide me with one I will start to add the pictures of the models.
[b]Pictures[/b] [i]Here Silent CJ, There's your picture.[/i] The below picture is nothing special, this is what I have done besides from the models (Still working on the models) [img]http://i193.photobucket.com/albums/z147/ownerhami/client-1.jpg[/img]
Some people just think this is a blank 317 deob with nothing added to it, no I have added a a few features that I will be showing you very soon, the only reason why I posted that one picture of the start up is because Silent CJ requested at least 1 image.
[b]Interfaces[/b] The interfaces now load from the Sub cache, these are not hard coded.
[b]Server[/b]
Type: Rs2D Modified by efilite.
[b]Pest control[/b] I have finished a full pest control mini game, there are no glitches and the portal doesn't move left to right like most of the private servers. There is a better collection of items when you finish the minigame, here's a picture;
[img]http://i193.photobucket.com/albums/z147/ownerhami/pestcontrol.png[/img]
^ Thanks to Tonic for the images.
[b]Bounty hunter[/b] I am in the process of adding a bounty hunter game, I have had to use part of the wilderness as the bounty hunter location, but that's okay for now. [img]http://i193.photobucket.com/albums/z147/ownerhami/bounty.jpg[/img] Thanks.

item.title: Hextion client; Hextion Server
item.dc:creator: @Hextion Hextion
item.description:
@Hextion wrote:

[quote=“Taharok, post:33, topic:291328”][quote author=zyle1992 link=topic=385015.msg2889962#msg2889962 date=1248835350]
So, it takes .454 seconds to load one model…

.454 seconds = 454 milliseconds(Already more than 1 millisecond)

100 models @ 454 milliseconds / model = .454 * 100 = 45 seconds.

Check your math next time.
[/quote]

.454 milliseconds to load them? That’s crazy. It takes a considerable less amount of time to render them. ~500 milliseconds of loading time is horrific.[/quote]
It is a average loading time, yet models still load faster than interfaces, sorry about my maths, it was 4:15 am when I posted that.

The models are still loading different, without damaging a cache it is something new.

Read full topic

Works fine the way it is.[/quote]
You mean, damaging the cache.

zyle1992:

And like she says… It may be from a “subcache” or whatever the hell you want to call it, but when you add more and more models, and you load them all within 1 millisecond, eventually, you will get heaped.

Each model gets loaded in a 0.454 second (According to the CMD), if I added 100 models it would load in one 6 seconds.

item.title: Hextion client; Hextion Server
item.dc:creator: @Hextion Hextion
item.description:
@Hextion wrote:

As I stated, it will not be released under the GNU licence, it will be used for my private server that I haven’t really started yet, hopefully I will be soon.

The unique feature of this client is the model loading procedure, as Miss.Silabsoft has just reminded me;

Miss Silabsoft:

by forcing the client to load all those model headers before really needing them your client has a high chance to heap unless ran as a desktop application only

But still, it has a unique feature on the loading method, as far as I know, I am the only one who has this, it loads the models from a sub cache not folder, therefore I am adding the models to the cache, they are loaded on start up within 1 millisecond.

Read full topic
